view template typecheck block ([#39974](https://github.com/angular/angular/issues/39974)) ([d482f5c](https://github.com/angular/angular/commit/d482f5c)) + + +### BREAKING CHANGES + +* **forms:** Previously `min` and `max` attributes defined on the `` +were ignored by Forms module. Now presence of these attributes would +trigger min/max validation logic (in case `formControl`, `formControlName` +or `ngModel` directives are also present on a given input) and +corresponding form control status would reflect that. + + + # 11.2.0 (2021-02-10)
